typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies
Movies aggregate(each(match(true()), $$+'_NotNull' = countIf(!isNull($$)), $$ + '_Null' = countIf(isNull($$))),
		each(match(type == 'double'  || type == 'integer' || type == 'short' || type == 'decimal'), $$+'_stddev' = round(stddev($$),2)),
		each(match(type=='string'), ERROR_FUNCTION('') = ERROR_FUNCTION(''))) ~> SummaryStats
Movies sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
